title: Los Angeles/Wilshire
name: M Caf√©
price: Most mains hover around the $10-15 range
content: One of the hottest new places in Hollywood. If you've been infected with Organica or Macrobiotica, head here ''now''. It's often impossibly crowded and parking's a nightmare. They've got lots of premade things that are handy if you're short on time, otherwise it's better to order fresh, considering how far you'll be set back.
